Articles.Content:
my best game AND trailer is portal 2:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/s79wHKe3DDM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Incredablly, my computer managed to handle it at a descent FPS (though the sound was off anear the ending) and i did have to cheat my way out of the underground and a few others :-[

still, it was a good game.

whats your favourite game and trailer?
